EmailTemplate.description: [subject line A] Animation: See how the NCR SelfServ 21 works [subject line B] A solution designed for ASIA https://www.ncr.com/selfserv21
EmailTemplate.name: 08-30-22 BNK SelfServ 21 SEA Email 3.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: Animation: See how the NCR SelfServ 21 works
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Don’t be fooled by the compact size of the NCR SelfServ 21. It’s one of our most powerful lobby dispensers to ever hit the market. Powered by our innovative S2 Media Dispense Module, the SelfServ 21 provides market-leading cassette capacity—including both four- and five- high configurations—giving increased availability and uptime. Plus its enhanced security innovations increase protection against cash-trap attacks, transaction-reversal fraud and card-skimming fraud too. Watch the animation to see the SelfServ 21 in action — and with NCR ATM as a Service we can help you run your ATM network better than ever before. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
